title: Star Guardian Ahri Fan Concept and Real Skin by LRY CiteMER

replies.body:
Citemer's work is always so awesome :) As a courtesy to the artists its nice to link their site as well! He has tons more amazing LoL fanart that you should definitely check out, including tons of concepts of his version of SG Ahri! https://www.artstation.com/citemer

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Wow... I'll be in my bunk.
i dont know what i was expecting when i clicked that link
In orders words; FUCKING SOURCE YOUR SHIT

Have you guys considered adding more chromas for Legendary skins?

I makes sence as they are rather popular/expensive.
I know that DM Darius has one, OS Teemo has one, and I feel like one or two more do. But I would totally buy this ahri skin if that purple one came as a chroma.
Well, that's why we have chromas.
Cute art, tho wtf is Kiko doing to that other familiar lol

This artist has my tastes. Very beautiful pieces with tons of, um, story.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
The fan art has more... personality {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
